text_126.en: In mobile UI development, a button group refers to a collection of buttons presented together, often used for related actions. The grouping helps organize and visually connect buttons with similar functions. Design principles may include consistent styling, alignment, and spacing for a unified appearance, promoting a cohesive user experience when interacting with multiple buttons in a single context.

text_130.en: Add a button group into your app using the `addButtonGroup` method like this:

text_137.en: A toggleable buttongroup can accept additional `Radio` option to have atmost one toggled button item. If buttongroup is toggleable, please refer to the `setOnTouch` callback for the correct order of arguments.

text_139.en: Here are the setter and/or getter properties of the ButtonGroup Component.

text_189.en: Here are the methods available for ButtonGroup Component

text_191.en: Adds a callback handler when a button item is touch. If the button is `toggleable` the arguments pass into the callback function is `text, index, active, pos` respectively, where `active` is the active state of the button item.

text_195.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_199.en: Sets a new text for the item in the button group.

text_204.en: Adds an additional item in the button group.

text_208.en: Removes an item in the button group by its index.

text_212.en: Removes an item in the button group by its name.

text_216.en: Removes the last item of the button group. This will return the item being removed.

text_219.en: Removes the first item in the button group. This will return the item being removed.

text_222.en: Adds a tooltips to the ButtonGroup items.

text_227.en: Enable of disable the elevation of the button group.

text_231.en: Enable or disable a button item in the button group.

text_236.en: Get the enabled state of the button item in the button group.

text_241.en: Enable or disable a button item by its name.

text_246.en: Get the enabled state of button item in the button group.

text_32.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_41.en: Sets the size of the component.

text_58.en: Sets the x and y scaling of the component.

text_63.en: Returns the position of the component. The return object is of the form `{left, top, right, bottom}`

text_68.en: Sets the margin of the component.

text_76.en: Sets the padding of the component's container.

text_84.en: Sets the position of the component relative to its parent dimensions.

text_90.en: Sets the border line for the component container.

text_99.en: Sets the corner radius of the component.

text_107.en: Bring this component forward by a given z-index.

text_111.en: Bring this component backward by a given z-index.
